name: SmartScrape
description: SmartScrape extracts specific data from web pages using a large language model. Users provide a URL and instructions for what content to extract, along with optional formatting guidelines. The tool processes the page and returns the requested data in the specified format. To use, input a URL and clear extraction instructions (e.g., "Extract product prices") with optional format rules (e.g., "Return as: Price: $X").
author: @@official.shinkai

extract_instructions.description: Default free-text extraction instructions describing what to extract from the page. Be clear, detailed and specific for better results. Use this configuration to create a tool that always extracts the same content.

format_instructions.description: Default free-text describing the output format(s) the LLM should follow. Be clear, specific, and give examples for better results. (e.g., 'Return lines as: field: value'. 'Return only a JSON format as:...). Use this configuration to create a tool that always outputs the content in the same format.

url.description: Default URL to download the page from. Use this configuration to create a tool that always scrapes the same URL.

format_instructions.description: Free-text describing the output format(s) the LLM should follow (overrides config.format_instructions). Be clear, specific, and give examples for better results. (e.g., 'Return lines as: field: value'. 'Return only a JSON format as:...).

extract_instructions.description: Free-text extraction instructions describing what to extract from the page (overrides config.extract_instructions). Be clear, detailed and specific for better results.
